mapper.select: /* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.getAssetsBankDepWdrlInfo - 자산관리(은행메인 - 최근 입출금 내역) */ SELECT TB.NO_PERSON, TB.AN, DECODE( SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( TB.DT_TRD, 'MM' ), 1, 1 ), '0', SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( TB.DT_TRD, 'MM' ), 2, 1 ), TO_CHAR( TB.DT_TRD, 'MM' ))|| '/' || DECODE( SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( TB.DT_TRD, 'DD' ), 1, 1 ), '0', SUBSTR( TO_CHAR( TB.DT_TRD, 'DD' ), 2, 1 ), TO_CHAR( TB.DT_TRD, 'DD' ))|| ' ' || SUBSTR( TM_TRD, 0, 2 )|| ':' || SUBSTR( TM_TRD, 3, 2 ) AS DT_TRD, TB.AMT_DEP, TB.AMT_WDRL, TB.DOC1, TB.DOC2 FROM ( SELECT NO_PERSON, XX1.DEC_VARCHAR2_SEL(AN, '10','FS_ARIA','SCR_TRANSACTION_DETAIL','AN') AS AN, TO_DATE( DT_TRD ) AS DT_TRD, TM_TRD, AMT_WDRL, AMT_DEP, BALANCE, DOC1, DOC2 FROM SCR_TRANSACTION_DETAIL WHERE NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY ( DT_TRD || TM_TRD ) DESC ) TB WHERE ROWNUM = 1

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.listAssetsSharePerson - 자산관리(은행메인 - 공유자list) */ SELECT NO_PERSON, NM_PERSON, ROWNUM RK FROM ( SELECT OFFER_NO_PERSON AS NO_PERSON, OFFER_NM_PERSON AS NM_PERSON FROM SHARE_INFO WHERE SHARE_STATUS = '02' AND YN_ASSET_INFO = 'Y' AND REQ_NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY DT_FRT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
mapper.update: /* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.updateAssetsSortInfo - 자산관리(정렬순서 변경) */ UPDATE ASSETS_INFO SET SORT = #{sort, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_LST = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_LST = SYSDATE WHERE NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NO_ACCOUNT = XX1.ENC_VARCHAR2_INS(#{no_account, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '11', 'FS_ARIA', 'ASSETS_INFO', 'NO_ACCOUNT')
mapper.select: /* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.getAssetsInfo - 자산관리(자산개별정보) */ SELECT XX1.DEC_VARCHAR2_SEL(AI.NO_ACCOUNT, '10','FS_ARIA','ASSETS_INFO','NO_ACCOUNT') AS NO_ACCOUNT, AI.NM_ACCOUNT, AI.CD_FC, ( SELECT NM_FC FROM FC_INFO WHERE CD_FC = AI.CD_FC ) AS NM_FC, AI.AMT_BALANCE, AI.AMT_EVALUATION, AI.CD_ASSETS_CLASS, AI.CD_DETAIL_CLASS FROM ASSETS_INFO AI WHERE AI.NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AI.NO_ACCOUNT = XX1.ENC_VARCHAR2_INS(#{no_account, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '11', 'FS_ARIA', 'ASSETS_INFO', 'AI.NO_ACCOUNT')

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.listAssetsBankActTrns - 자산관리(은행 계좌상세 - 입출금내역) */ SELECT SEQ_TRAN, DT_TRD, TM_TRD, AMT_WDRL, AMT_DEP, BALANCE, DOC1, DOC2, DEALWAY1, DEALWAY2, RNUM FROM ( SELECT LST.SEQ_TRAN, LST.DT_TRD, LST.TM_TRD, LST.AMT_WDRL, LST.AMT_DEP, LST.BALANCE, LST.DOC1, LST.DOC2, LST.DEALWAY1, LST.DEALWAY2, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT STD.SEQ_TRAN, STD.DT_TRD, STD.TM_TRD, STD.AMT_WDRL, STD.AMT_DEP, STD.BALANCE, STD.DOC1, STD.DOC2, STD.DEALWAY1, STD.DEALWAY2 FROM SCR_TRANSACTION_DETAIL STD
ORDER BY ( DT_TRD || TM_TRD ) DESC ) LST WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPosition, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startPosition, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.listAssetsBankActTrnsCount - 자산관리(은행 계좌상세 - 입출금내역Count) */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS recordCount FROM ( SELECT STD.SEQ_TRAN, STD.DT_TRD, STD.TM_TRD, STD.AMT_WDRL, STD.AMT_DEP, STD.BALANCE, STD.DOC1, STD.DOC2, STD.DEALWAY1, STD.DEALWAY2 FROM SCR_TRANSACTION_DETAIL STD
) TB

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.listAssetsBankActSvng - 자산관리(은행 계좌상세 - 예적금내역) */ SELECT DT_TRD, TM_TRD, RND_TRD, AMT_TRD_MTH, AMT_DEP, AMT_WDRL, BALANCE, ABSTRACT AS ABSTRACTS, BRN_DEAL, RNUM FROM ( SELECT LST.DT_TRD, LST.TM_TRD, LST.RND_TRD, LST.AMT_TRD_MTH, LST.AMT_DEP, LST.AMT_WDRL, LST.BALANCE, LST.ABSTRACT, LST.BRN_DEAL, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SSSD.DT_TRD, SSSD.TM_TRD, SSSD.RND_TRD, SSSD.AMT_TRD_MTH, SSSD.AMT_DEP, SSSD.AMT_WDRL, SSSD.BALANCE, SSSD.ABSTRACT, SSSD.BRN_DEAL FROM SCR_SVNG_SVNIN_DETAIL SSSD
ORDER BY ( DT_TRD || TM_TRD ) DESC ) LST WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPosition, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startPosition, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.listAssetsBankActSvngCount - 자산관리(은행 계좌상세 - 예적금내역Count) */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS recordCount FROM ( SELECT SSSD.DT_TRD, SSSD.TM_TRD, SSSD.RND_TRD, SSSD.AMT_TRD_MTH, SSSD.AMT_DEP, SSSD.AMT_WDRL, SSSD.BALANCE, SSSD.ABSTRACT, SSSD.BRN_DEAL FROM SCR_SVNG_SVNIN_DETAIL SSSD
) TB

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.getAssetsBankDepWdrlDetail - 자산관리(입출금상세) */ SELECT AI.CD_FC, ( SELECT NM_FC FROM FC_INFO WHERE CD_FC = AI.CD_FC ) AS NM_FC, AI.NO_ACCOUNT, AI.NM_ACCOUNT, XX1.DEC_VARCHAR2_SEL(STD.AN, '10','FS_ARIA','SCR_TRANSACTION_DETAIL','AN') AS AN, STD.DT_TRD, STD.TM_TRD, DECODE( STD.AMT_WDRL, '0', '01', '02' ) AS CD_TRNS, DECODE( STD.AMT_WDRL, '0', '입금', '출금' ) AS NM_TRNS, STD.DEALWAY1, STD.DEALWAY2, STD.DOC1, STD.DOC2, STD.AMT_DEP, STD.AMT_WDRL, STD.BALANCE FROM ASSETS_INFO AI INNER JOIN SCR_TRANSACTION_DETAIL STD ON ( STD.NO_PERSON = AI.NO_PERSON AND STD.AN = AI.NO_ACCOUNT ) WHERE STD.SEQ_TRAN = #{seq_tran, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.getAssetsDetailCsInfo - 자산관리(입출금상세 소비정보) */ SELECT CI.CD_CLASS, PCCI.NM_CLASS, CI.CD_TYPE, PCCI.NM_TYPE FROM CONSUME_INFO CI INNER JOIN PERSON_CONSUME_CLASS_INFO PCCI ON ( PCCI.NO_PERSON = CI.NO_PERSON AND PCCI.CD_CLASS = CI.CD_CLASS AND PCCI.CD_TYPE = CI.CD_TYPE ) WHERE CI.SEQ_TRAN = #{seq_tran, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.getAssetsStockInfo - 자산관리(증권 - 계좌 개별정보) */ SELECT SS.CD_FC, ( SELECT NM_FC FROM FC_INFO WHERE SS.CD_FC = CD_FC ) AS NM_FC, SS.ACCNO, NVL( TO_CHAR(( SS.TOTALACCVAL + SS.CASHBALANCE )), '-' ) AS AMT_STOCK, NVL( SS.CASHAVWITHDRAW, '-' ) AS CASHAVWITHDRAW, NVL( SS.SUBSMARGIN, '-' ) AS SUBSMARGIN, NVL( SS.RECEIVABLE, '-' ) AS RECEIVABLE, NVL( SS.LOANCREDIT, '-' ) AS LOANCREDIT, NVL( SS.VALUEATCUR, '-' ) AS VALUEATCUR, NVL( SS.PROLOSS, 0 ) AS PROLOSS FROM STOCK_SUMMARY SS WHERE SS.NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SS.ACCNO = #{no_account, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.getAssetsStockShrInfo - 자산관리(증권 - 주식정보) */ SELECT ISINCODE, SUBSTR( ISINCODE, 4, 6 ) ISINCODE_NM, VALATCUR, PROLOSS, EARNINGRATE, QTY, VALATTRADE, ( VALATTRADE / QTY ) AS AVG_VALATTRADE FROM STOCK_EQUITYLIST WHERE NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ACCNO = #{no_account, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ISINCODE = #{acc_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: /* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.createAssetsInfo - 자산관리(직접입력) */ INSERT INTO ASSETS_INFO( NO_PERSON, CD_ASSETS_CLASS, CD_DETAIL_CLASS, AMT_BALANCE, REAL_ESTATE_ADDR, NM_MODEL, AMOUNT_JEWELRY, ETC_ASSETS, MEMO, AMT_EVALUATION, YN_DELETE, YN_PERSON_REGIST, ID_FRT, DT_FRT, ID_LST, DT_LST ) VALUES( #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cd_assets_class, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cd_detail_class, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amt_balance, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{real_estate_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nm_model, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount_jewelry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etc_assets, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amt_evaluation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', 'Y', #{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: /* com.koscom.assets.dao.AssetsMapper.listAssetsEtcMain - 자산관리(기타메인) */ SELECT AI.CD_ASSETS_CLASS, CD.NM_CODE, COUNT( AI.NO_PERSON ) AS CNT_ITEM, SUM( AMT_EVALUATION ) AS SUM_AMT_EVALUATION FROM ASSETS_INFO AI INNER JOIN (SELECT CODE_VALUE, NM_CODE FROM COMM_CD WHERE CODE_GROUP = 'cd_assets_class' AND (CODE_VALUE != '00' AND CODE_VALUE != '10' AND CODE_VALUE != '20') ) CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = AI.CD_ASSETS_CLASS WHERE (AI.DT_EXPIRE IS NULL OR AI.DT_EXPIRE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AND AI.YN_DELETE = 'N' AND AI.YN_PERSON_REGIST = 'Y' AND AI.NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY AI.CD_ASSETS_CLASS, CD.NM_CODE ORDER BY AI.CD_ASSETS_CLASS
